fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
~ Lead Through Action (2-shot): Use an ability that an Communications or Support Agent can use. This may not be used at night if you are in a Dinner Discussion.
~ Dinner Discussion (Infinite): During the day, choose a player. You will share a chat with them the next night, removing them from any factional chats they are in. You will appear as “Charlie” to them, and you learn their role at the end of the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
~ At the start of the game, you will learn the role of a random player. This does not bypass detection immunity, if such immunity grants the ability to choose a disguise role.
~ You have roleblock, control, and redirection immunity. If any of these are attempted on you, you will learn what role attempted to cause it.
~ If you carry the factional kill, you will roleblock your target.
